citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 nor at
5:30 pm on 06/20/2016.
Contact the inspector to provide times and dates when an inspection may be conducted. Also provide any
information regarding upcoming exhibits.
